transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello Mayank ji baat kar rahe hain sir?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Mayank ji namaskar sir main Shubham baat kar raha hun IndiaMART office se kaise hain aap?

Customer: Badhiya ji.

Executive: Sir actually isliye call kiya tha ki aapki services chal rahi hai hamare sath Nandlal Rakesh Kumar ki.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Aur sir iska na renewal tha sir 4 November iski last date thi.

Customer: To kal hamare kal bhi aapka phone aaya tha kal main drive kar raha tha us time main bahar gaya hua tha.

Executive: Haan ji haan ji Mayank ji se baat kiye sir.

Customer: Shadi abhi hui na to thoda kam ab bahar jana padta hai kai baar disturb ho gaya.

Executive: Samajh gaya samajh gaya Mayank ji wo to main samajh gaya main keh raha tha sir ki iska 4 tarikh last date thi sir karwa lijiye aise sir services band hone ke liye aayi hui hai.

Customer: Haan to sir aisa karo kal ruk jaoge kal kal subah kal karwa lu.

Executive: Sir please aaj hi kara do na kal aur aaj mein kitna hi kal aur aaj mein kya difference aa jayega payment aani hai payment aani hai payment aani hai ek bar nahi payment jo aani hai mere ko ye jo payment aani hai kal aani hai.

Customer: Mere paas payment to aaj aani hai.

Executive: To aaj hi karaiye sir sham tak karwa dijiye.

Customer: Aisa hai payment aate hi aaj hi karwa deta hun.

Executive: Kya keh rahe ho?

Customer: Payment aate hi aaj hi karwa deta hun agar aaj payment aati hai na to aaj hi karwa deta hun.

Executive: Theek hai fir main aapko proposal bhijwa du price price bataye hua hai sir aapko Ranjeet ne ya nahi bataye hua hai ye bataye.

Customer: Theek hai bhai.

Executive: Haan ji?

Customer: Theek hai main phone rakhna padta nahi paya tha drive kar raha tha.

Executive: Main bata deta hun sir aapko kya prices rahega aapki jo maximizer service hai sir.

Customer: Price

Executive: Ek second rukiye.

Customer: Mayank ji aapki jo maximizer service hai ye basically abhi jo iska ek saal ka price hai wo 75000 plus GST hai lekin agar aap plan karte ho to main aapko yahi same service aapko final 65000 plus GST mein abhi kara sakta hun saal bhar ki.

Customer: Main aap isse nahi karwaunga.

Executive: Kya?

Customer: Sir aawaz bahut kat rahi hai rukiye main aapko dobara voice bahut break ho rahi hai sir hello main 5000 plus GST hoga.

Executive: Kya keh rahe ho?

Customer: 50 plus GST mein hua tha mera last year ka.

Executive: Kitne mein hua tha sir?

Customer: 60

Executive: Are rukiye sir main ek second aapko batata hun last time aapki na voice bahut kat rahi hai rukiye main laga ek second call pe rukiye ek second call pe ek bar check kar leta hun ek second call pe rukiye.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Last time aapne jo pay kiya tha sir wo total amount pay kiya tha humne 61655 sir.

Customer: Haan main to isi rate pe keh raha hun.

Executive: Sir isi rate pe to main dekh leta hun to main machine le lo fir apni wapis mere mere ko kam nahi hai market mein bilkul bhi 50000 to main deta hun mahine ke mere bachta kya hai.

Executive: Sir is rate pe to possible nahi hai lekin haan main koshish kar sakta hun ki iske aas pass kuch agar aapke liye kara paun.

Customer: Nahi nahi is rate mein hi auto mein sir aaj karwata hun nahi to fir marzi aapki hai aapki website hai.

Executive: Sir website wali baat nahi website to aapki bhi hai sir aisa thoda hi hai ki aap ye nahi padta nahi aata sir mere padta hai pehli baat to pichle do mahine se main kuch kamai nahi isme koi profit hota baat bhi hai pichle do mahine se mere ko income nahi hui isse.

Executive: Sir aap ek kam kar lo agar aap meri baat mano aap aap do saal do saal ka plan nahi kar payenge kya do saal ka dekh lo.

Customer: Nahi nahi abhi to kuch income hui nahi hai abhi thoda kharche jyada hogi.

Executive: Mayank ji 9 saal purane supplier ho aapko yaad nahi hoga aapki services maine bhi bahut time pehle dekhi hai.

Customer: Nahi hai lekin is time jo is time hai na market mein manda aa gaya hotel ke kam mein.

Executive: Are malik manda to manda sir manda tabhi se aa raha hai aap do saal se aa raha hai ji do saal se aa raha ek saal se nahi aa do saal se aa raha ab pehle wali kamai nahi thi pehle main ek ek lakh mahina kamata tha ab to 10000 15000 mein sakte hai.

Executive: Sir dekho main aapko ye kar sakta hun aap ek kam kar lo meri mera ek suggestion hai aapko aap ek bar koshish kar lo do saal ki bhale hi part payment mein kar lo deal mere ko full payment mat do bhale hi do bar paisa de do aap mere ko mahine ke andar lekin do saal ka kar lo do saal mein do fayde hain ek to sir jo do saal tak paise badhenge wo bhi bach jayenge aur do saal ka main price bhi aapko ekdam last karwa dunga kyuki saal bhar ka sir 65000 hai agar main kam wam bhi karwa paunga man lo maine kam bhi karaya sir dekho waise 75000 hai aur main matlab apne se nahi bol raha sir aap to agle saal 90000 kar doge usse agle saal 110000 kar doge padta nahi aata ji hamare.

Executive: To sir main keh to raha hun ek bar aap do saal ka dekh lo nahi nahi hone ka nahi hai sir pehli bar meri meri aadat teen din meri aadat teen din pehle pass hui thi aap se to piche se payment nahi aa rahi is time payment thoda hard tight ho rakha hai thoda shadi mein bhi kharche jyada ho gaya ek bar aap ek bar check karo aapko maine hello dala hai ek bar aap check karo pehle ha main are ek second ji main na train train chal raha ek second hold karna.

Executive: Whatsapp pe dekho aapko yahi wala number hai na aapka aaj bhi mere paas save hai sir ye wala number hai na 8588773597 dekho ji paisa kahan pe paisa karega ji mere bed ke bahar ho raha hai maine mana kar diya.

Executive: Sir to main ek kam kar deta hun na aap meri baat to sun lo haan ji aap aapko maine ek link bheja hai aap ek bar open karo main aap wo link open nahi ho raha ho nahi raha aap hello karke mere ko dal do tab to hoga sir aapne mera number save nahi kiya hua maine to kiya hi hua hai aap ek bar mere ko reply are aapka naam aa gaya Shubham naam hai na haan haan link aaya nahi ek minute ab aa gaya ek minute thoda matter chal raha hun na haan haan isse aap dekho sir isme na prices mein check kar sakte ho sir online maine aapko wo bhi bheja hai alag screenshot sir ye mera price selling hai lekin main aapko saal bhar ka jo hai wo 65000 mein bata raha hun 65 pe bhi aapke liye to discount karke jo final aapko main karwa sakta hun wo aapka round round jo pad jayega aapko wo 61550 pad jayega sir lekin usse niche possible nahi ho pa raha pichli bar kitne ka hua tha pichli bar pichli bar sir aapne main bata de raha hun pichli bar aapne jo final diya tha wo mere ko 52500 plus GST diya tha 55000 haan ji is bar price badh gaye hain sir aur teen char saal mein ab price badhe hain sir har bar nahi badhte har bar are main to pichli bar bhi liye rahe har bar are sir mera bill mera bill check karo na aap ha kar raha hun sir mere ko pichle saal ka bill bhejo aap ek bar invoice mera uska GST refund bhi nahi liya mere ko bill bhejo aap ek bar GST refund nahi liya sir ab tak ha thoda invoice bhi bhejo pichli bar ka wo bhej dunga sir lekin iska main kya keh raha hun main bhej deta hun aapko lekin main keh raha hun sir iska ek bar teen saal ka do saal ka dekh lo hone ka nahi hai sir main pichle 9 saal se kabhi do saal ka karwaya hi nahi aapko bhi pata hai sir fir sir fir kareeb aapka sir is baat ka dekho is baat ka topic hi bekar hai dekho maine aapko genuine bata diya hone ka hi nahi aap ye ek saal wala dekh lo ek saal wala karwa lo kyuki maine ab mal kharida hai agar payment kam padegi to material milega teen char din ke baad jayegi sir sir main samajh gaya aapki baat lekin vishwas hai sir aaj payment aa rahi hai aapko mazak nahi kar raha aaj payment aa rahi hai karwa apna agar aaj ke baad agar maine kai aur invest kar liya are Mayank ji main aapki baat pe vishwas na karu aisa ho hi nahi sakta aapke sath maine aaj se kam nahi kar raha hun 9 saal ho gaya koi baat nahi aap mere ko whatsapp karo itna main khana khana kha leta hun aapko late tak chala kar thoda main whatsapp kar deta hun lekin sir price thoda sa to upar jayega use aap please adjust kariye main aapko by rate by rate aap sahi hai ek bar price to bhejo main baat to karu theek hai ji bhej raha hun invoice bhi bhejna mera invoice hello main keh raha pichle saal ka invoice bill bhej do bhej raha hun sir pichle saal ki invoice bhi bhej raha hun dono bhej raha hun invoice bhi bhej raha hun aur aapko jo abhi is bar best price ho jayega maine aapko price dikha diya 75000 hai sir jo last kar sakta hun baat karke aapko bhi bhej deta hun jo ekdam last ho jayega bhej do bhej do theek hai ji ok sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants subscription at previous rate.

- Customer states income is low.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a 2-year plan with part payment.

- Executive agreed to send invoice and price.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send invoice and price.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, payment, price, invoice
